snippet.title: Supermodel Alek Wek On The Business Of Fashion, Being The Face Of Refugees And Life After The Runway
snippet.description: This exclusive interview appears as the cover story in the Oct. / Dec. 2013 issue of Forbes Life Africa as "The Beauty That Tumbled From War". Alek Wek is as much a supermodel as she is a girl-next-door. Wek has commanded the runways of fashion designers such as: Chanel; Hermes; Donna [...] read »

snippet.title: South Sudanese Supermodel Alek Wek Returns to the Country She Fled as a Teenager
snippet.description: In 1991, 14-year-old Alek Wek and her family escaped civil war-torn Sudan and relocated to London. Six years later, Wek was on the cover of Elle. Needless to say, her life has taken a turn or two. Last week, however, Wek came full circle as she traveled home with the United Nations Refugee [...] read »

snippet.title: Alek Wek Gets Down With Bullett
snippet.description: The most exciting photography and styling I've seen lately has been in the pages of Bullett magazine, the manifesto of Idil Tabanca and her gang of well-dressed international hooligans. read »

snippet.title: Isabel Marant And H&M Throw Big Party In Paris To Launch Collaboration
snippet.description: Isabel Marant and H&M partied away in big style to celebrate the launch of the Isabel Marant for H&M fashion collaboration

snippet.title: Bullett Revolution: Tastemaking For The International Cool Kids
snippet.description: Despite losing a founder and its publisher, Bullett magazine's second issue is due out April 12.

snippet.title: The 40 Most Powerful Celebrities In Africa
snippet.description: Musicians dominate the list I compiled of the 40 most powerful celebrities in Africa.

snippet.title: At New York Fashion Week, St. John Gets an Edge
snippet.description: Women of a certain age may be St. John Knits' most loyal patrons, but the gowns on display at its Fifth Avenue presentation this week were decidedly more sexy than anything I've seen on the junior leagers trotting around the Upper East Side. read »

snippet.title: Victoria's Secret Hall Of Fame
snippet.description: These models' hot bodies launched them to hot careers.

snippet.title: In Pictures: How 17 Stars Got Their Big Breaks
snippet.description: Hard work and networking helped. More important, when good luck came, they pounced.

snippet.title: The Second Life Of Victoria's Secret Models
snippet.description: Everybody knows their faces, their bodies, their names. A notable few have gone on to media or entrepreneurial careers with astonishing success. read »
